abstract: ed, The war from the sky
snippet: The scream of the air raid sirens has now become a nightly alarm in many British factory towns. Every night, almost without intermission, waves of German bombers roar over British targets and drop their loads of death as far from the east coast as...
lead_paragraph: The scream of the air raid sirens has now become a nightly alarm in many British factory towns. Every night, almost without intermission, waves of German bombers roar over British targets and drop their loads of death as far from the east coast as Wales and Southwestern England. Fortunately, the published figures of civilian casualties ...
